   atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt: gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ	aTa Kalu Sakrasya devAnAm indrasya etat aBUt: gamBIra prajQaH bata ayam
   subhūtisthaviro yatra hi nāma prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāñ	suBUti sTaviraH yatra hi nAma prajQaptim ca na viroDayati Darma tAQ
   copadiśati.	ca upadiSati.
   atha bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate sma: evam etat kauśikaivam	aTa BagavAn Sakram devAnAm indram Amantrayate sma: evam etat kOSika evam
   etad gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ yatra hi nāmaṃ prajñaptiṃ	etat gamBIra prajQaH bata ayam suBUtiH sTaviraH yatra hi nAmam prajQaptim
   ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.	ca na viroDayati Darma tAm ca upadiSati.
   atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ	aTa SakraH devAnAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat: kaTam Bagavan suBUtiH
   sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?	sTaviraH prajQaptim ca na viroDayati Darma tAm ca upadiSati?
   (ŚsP_II 3_62)	(ŚsP_II 3_62)
   evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: rūpaṃ kauśika	evam ukte BagavAn Cakram devAnAm indram etat avocat: rUpam kOSika
   prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro	prajQapti mAtram yat prajQapti mAtram sA DarmatA tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH 
   'virodhenopadiśati, vedanā kauśika prajñaptimātrā yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā	aviroDena upadiSati, vedanA kOSika prajQapti mAtrA yat prajQapti mAtram sA
   dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, saṃjñā kauśika	DarmatA tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH aviroDena upadiSati, saMjQA kOSika
   prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro	prajQapti mAtram yat prajQapti mAtram sA DarmatA tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH 
   'virodhenopadiśati, saṃskārāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ	aviroDena upadiSati, saMskArAH kOSika prajQapti mAtram yat prajQapti mAtram
   sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, vijñānaṃ kauśika	sA DarmatA tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH aviroDena upadiSati, vijQAnam kOSika
   prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro	prajQapti mAtram yat prajQapti mAtram sA DarmatA tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH 
   'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na	aviroDena upadiSati. tat kasya hetoH? yA kOSika DarmANAm DarmatA sA na
   rudhyate na virudhyate, yā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira	ruDyate na viruDyate, yA na rUDyate na virUDyate tAm suBUtiH sTavira
   upadiśati na ca virodhayati.	upadiSati na ca viroDayati.

   prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati, tat	prajQapti mAtram sA DarmatA tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH aviroDena upadiSati, tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,	kasya hetoH? yA kOSika DarmANAm DarmatA sA na ruDyate na viruDyate,
   yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca	yA na ruDyate na viruDyate tAm suBUtiH sTaviraH upadiSati na ca
   virodhayati. evaṃ khalu kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptito na ca	viroDayati. evam Kalu kOSika suBUtiH sTaviraH prajQaptitaH na ca
   virodhayati.	viroDayati.

   parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām upādāya, tathā hy abdhātoḥ parigraho	parigRhNAti, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm upAdAya, taTA hi abDAtoH parigrahaH

   evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām	evam Kalu Ayuzman CAradvatI putra boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sarva DarmANAm

   aniryānayogena.	aniryAna yogena.

   yat punaḥ kauśikaivaṃ vadasi, kuto bodhisattvena mahāsattvena	yat punar kOSika evam vadasi, kutas boDisattvena mahAsattvena
   prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyeti?	prajQApAramitA gavezita vyA iti?
   na kauśika rūpato gaveṣitavyā nānyatra rūpato gaveṣitavyā, na vedanāto	na kOSika rUpataH gavezitavyA na anyatra rUpataH gavezitavyA, na vedanAto
   gaveṣitavyā nānyatra vedanāto gaveṣitavyā, na saṃjñāto gaveṣitavyā	gavezitavyA na anyatra vedanAtas gavezitavyA, na saMjQAtaH gavezitavyA
   nānyatra saṃjñāto gaveṣitavyā, na saṃskārebhyo gaveṣitavyā nānyatra	na anyatra saMjQAtaH gavezitavyA, na saMskAreByaH gavezitavyAH na anyatra
   saṃskārebhyo gaveṣitavyā, na vijñānato gaveṣitavyā nānyatra vijñānato	saMskAreByaH gavezitavyA, na vijQAnataH gavezitavyAH na anyatra vijQAnataH 
   gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā	gavezitavyA. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi kOSika yat ca rUpam yA ca vedanA
   yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ, yaś ca bodhisattvo yā ca	yA ca saMjQA ye ca saMskArAH yat ca vijQAnaM, yaH ca boDisattvaH yA ca
   prajñāpāramitā yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarvam ete dharmā na	prajQApAramitA yA ca mahA karuNA yA ca gavezaNA sarvam ete DarmAH na
   saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad	saMyuktAH na visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGA eka lakzaNAH yat 
   utālakṣaṇāḥ.	uta alakzaNAH.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā na cakṣuṣo	punar aparam kOSika boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA na cakzuzaH 
   gaveṣitavyā nānyatra cakṣuṣo gaveṣitavyā, na śrotrād gaveṣitavyā nānyatra	gavezitavyAH na anyatra cakzuzaH gavezitavyA, na SrotrAt gavezitavyAH na anyatra
   śrotrād gaveṣitavyā, na ghrāṇād gaveṣitavyā nānyatra ghrāṇād gaveṣitavyā,	SrotrAt gavezitavyA, na GrANAt gavezitavyAH na anyatra GrANAt gavezitavyA,
   na jihvāyā gaveṣitavyā nānyatra jihvāyā gaveṣitavyā, na kāyād gaveṣitavyā	na jihvAyAH gavezitavyA na anyatra jihvAyAH gavezitavyA, na kAyAt gavezitavyA
   nānyatra kāyād gaveṣitavyā, na manaso gaveṣitavyā nānyatra manaso	na anyatra kAyAt gavezitavyA, na manasaH gavezitavyAH na anyatra manasaH 
   gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika yac ca cakṣur yac ca	gavezitavyA. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi kOSika yat ca cakzuH yat ca
   śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yaś ca	Srotram yat ca GrANam yA ca jihvA yaH ca kAyaH yat ca manaH yaH ca
   bodhisattvo yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā ca gaveṣaṇā, sarva ete dharmā na	boDisattvaH yA ca prajQApAramitA yA ca gavezaNA, sarve ete DarmAH na
   saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad	saMyuktAH na visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGA eka lakzaNAH yat 
   utālakṣaṇāḥ.	uta alakzaNAH.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā na rūpād	punar aparam kOSika boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA na rUpAt

   na rasād gaveṣitavyā nānyatra rasād gaveṣitavyā, na sparśād gaveṣitavyā	na rasAt gavezitavyA na anyatra rasAt gavezitavyA, na sparSAt gavezitavyA
   nānyatra sparśād gaveṣitavyā, na dharmebhyo gaveṣitavyā (ŚsP_II 3_147)	na anyatra sparSAt gavezitavyA, na DarmeByaH gavezitavyA (ŚsP_II 3_147)
   nānyatra dharmebhyo gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika yac ca	na anyatra DarmeByaH gavezitavyA. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi kOSika yat ca
   rūpaṃ yaś ca śabdo yaś ca gandho yaś ca raso yaś ca sparśo ye ca dharmā	rUpam yaH ca SabdaH yaH ca ganDaH yaH ca rasaH yaH ca sparSaH ye ca DarmA
   yaś ca bodhisattvo yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarva ete dharmā na	yaH ca boDisattvaH yA ca prajQApAramitA yA ca gavezaNA sarve ete DarmAH na
   saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad	saMyuktAH na visaMyuktAH arUpiNaH anidarSanAH apratiGA eka lakzaNAH yat 
   utālakṣaṇāh.	uta alakzaNa ah.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā na	punar aparam kOSika boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitA na

   'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.	anidarSanAH apratiGAH eka lakzaNAH yat uta alakzaNAH.

   na cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānāt prajñāpāramitā,	na cakzuH vijQAnam prajQApAramitA na anyatra cakzuH vijQAnAt prajQApAramitA,

   prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā, na saṃskāratathatā	prajQApAramitA na anyatra saMskAreByaH prajQApAramitA, na saMskAra taTatA

   atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:	aTa Kalu SakraH devAnAm indraH sTaviram suBUtim etat avocat :
   mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta	mahA pAramitA iyam Badanta suBUte boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm yat uta
   prajñāpāramitā, apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ	prajQApAramitA, apramANa pAramitA iyam Badanta suBUte boDisattvAnAm

   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,	boDisattvam mahAsattvam Agamya kzatriya mahA SAla kulAni prajQAyante,

   akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante.	akanizWAH devAH prajQAyante.
   bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate, srotaāpannaḥ	boDisattvam mahAsattvam Agamya srotaApatti Palam prajQAyate, srotaApannaH

   tasmād bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā	tasmAt boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH sa deva mAnuza asureNa lokena satkartavyA

   rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā, mānsa kauśika satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ	rakzA AvaraNa guptiH saMviDAtavyA, mAn sa kOSika satkartavyam guru kartavyam

   mānayitavyaṃ pūjayitavyaṃ manyet.	mAnayitavyam pUjayitavyam manyet.
   tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyo	tasmAt boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH sa deva mAnuza asureNa lokena satkartavyaH 
   gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayītavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cāsya	guru kartavyaH mAnayitavyaH pUjayItavyaH satata samitam ca asya
   rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā, yac ca kauśikāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro	rakzA AvaraNa guptiH saMviDAtavyA, yat ca kOSikAyam tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH 
   lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇe bhavec chrāvakapratyekabuddhais tad yathā pi nāma	lokaDAtuH paripUrNe Bavet SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH tat yaTA pi nAma
   naḍavanaṃ vā ikṣvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śāravanaṃ vā śārivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ	naxa vanam vA ikzu anam vA Sara vanam vA SAra vanam vA SAri vanam vA tila vanam

   mānayet pūjayed ayam ayam eva tato bahutato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat	mAnayet pUjayet ayam ayam eva tatas bahu tataH bahutaram puNyam prasavet. tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? na khalu punaḥ kauśika tāṃc chrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya	kasya hetoH? na Kalu punar kOSika tAn SrAvaka pratyekabudDAn Agamya
   bodhisattvo mahāsattvo loke prajñāyate, na tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho	boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH loke prajQAyate, na taTAgataH arhan samyaksaMbudDaH

   rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.	rakzA AvaraNa guptiH saMviDAtavyA.
